name: Balsamic Vinaigrette
description: This Balsamic Vinaigrette is a perfect concoction for those looking to enjoy a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar dressing without sacrificing flavor. Blended with healthy ingredients, it's an excellent choice for a health-conscious diet.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk together the minced garlic, 0.06 tsp of ground white pepper, 93.75 ml of extra virgin olive oil, 0.25 cup(s) of balsamic vinegar, and 0.06 tsp of rock salt until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Taste the vinaigrette and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Store the vinaigrette in a sealed container in the refrigerator until ready to use.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
